sentences.en: A vertiginous climb up the face of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 头晕目眩地爬到悬崖峭壁之上.

sentences.en: a vertiginous drop to the valley below
sentences.cn: 到下面山谷令人眩晕的落差

sentences.en: Chan a 34 - year - old high - school dropout, has one of Hong Kong's most vertiginous and challenging blue - collar jobs .
sentences.cn: 陈,34 岁,高中辍学生, 是香港最令人眩晕,最具挑战性的 蓝领工人 之一.

sentences.en: From the path there was a vertiginous drop to the valley below.
sentences.cn: 从小路向谷底望去令人眩晕。

sentences.en: You'll find 10 vertiginous slopes in 4 unique locations, each - with their features, bonuses and surprises.
sentences.cn: 你会发现10眩晕斜坡4独特的位置, 每个 - 其特点, 奖金和惊喜.

words.tran_cn: 眩晕的，眼花的；旋转的；不稳定的

trans.tran_cn: 头晕的，引起头晕的，多变化的
